required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Detectability of Clenbuterol and Physiological Response in Human Skeletal Muscle

brief_summary.textblock: Due to the long half-life (~36 hr) of clenbuterol, detection methods such as dried blood spots (DBS) are a potentially suitable method to easily and non-invasively detect doping misuse of this compound for several days after ingestion. If, and how long, the compound can be detected by DBS has not yet been investigated but is of interest due to its potential in doping-control. The aim is to evaluate whether abuse of clenbuterol can be detected at relevant concentration levels in samples obtained using DBS and to assess the physiological response to clenbuterol in skeletal muscle..

primary_outcome.time_frame: Before (baseline) as well as 3, 8, 24, 72, 168 and 240 hours after administration of clenbuterol
primary_outcome.description: Concentration of clenbuterol in dried blood spots

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before (baseline) as well as 3, 8, 24, 72, 168 and 240 hours after administration of clenbuterol
secondary_outcome.description: Concentration of clenbuterol in venous blood

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before (baseline) as well as 3, 8, 24, 72, 168 and 240 hours after administration of clenbuterol
Before (baseline) and 2.5 hours after administration of clenbuterol
secondary_outcome.description: Maximal voluntary isometric contraction in N/m2 of the quadriceps

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before (baseline) and 2.5 hours after administration of clenbuterol
secondary_outcome.description: Protein kinase A phosphorylation in vastus lateralis biopsies

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before (baseline) as well as 2 and 5 hours after administration of clenbuterol
Before (baseline) as well as 2.5 hours after administration of clenbuterol
secondary_outcome.description: mTOR phosphorylation in vastus lateralis biopsies

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before (baseline) as well as 2 and 5 hours after administration of clenbuterol
secondary_outcome.description: Respriatory exchange ratio of oxygen and CO2

arm_group.description: Subjects ingest 80 micrograms of clenbuterol tablets

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy
- Male
- 18-40 years of age
- No known contraindications for anabolic drugs (e.g. cancer)
Exclusion Criteria:
- Abnormal ECG
- Steroid abuse
- Ongoing use of prescription medication
- heavy resistance training more than 2 times weekly
- Disease deemed by the MD to infer a risk to participate in the trial
